long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The League Board Rank Authenticator (LBRA) is a browser extension that displays your LoL rank on the League Board. It is intended to reduce the amount of heoeon (허언) in the LoL communities.
